ED_DecisionText:
At its 115th plenary meeting, on 13 September 2018, the General Assembly, under rule 81 of its rules of procedure, decided to reconsider the provision contained in paragraph 3 of its resolution 72/243 of 22 December 2017. 

At its 115th plenary meeting, on 13 September 2018, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President,  decided that the opening plenary meeting of the high-level plenary meeting of the General Assembly, to be known as the Nelson Mandela Peace Summit, would also feature statements by the President of the Republic of South Africa and the Prime Minister of Ireland.
